ygData.subject: Re: Leap of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Add this to Astroblast. ... Some of Torca s nails pelt his side, several pierce his armour, luckily, nothing serious has been hit, yet.

OOC: Add this to Astroblast.

--- Astroblast ---

Some of Torca's nails pelt his side, several pierce his armour, 
luckily, nothing serious has been hit, yet.


On 16 May 2001, at 21:26, rAuq wrote:

> OOC: Hey Jordan, where are Axis, Lokk, and Seekker?
> OOC2: Seeing that Megatron has entered Astroblast, you should 
> be firing at Astroblast. =0
> 
> --- Astroblast / Switchblade / Menasor / Lynxiz / Rippersnapper ---
> 
> Astroblast jets forward, dodging left and right, a green blast flies
> by him and continues toward Tigerhawk, machinegun bullets strafe his
> side, denting his heavy armour. Several laser blasts streak past him,
> one hits his side armour, leaving a smoking groove. Mini rockets crash
> by him and into his top, shaking him and almost knocking out of
> flight. Astroblast swoops down towards Fireblade, and meets
> Switchblade there.
> 
> Switchblade smiles, still cloaked. He throws the remains of 
> Fireblade into the hatch, then hops in himself. He yells to 
> Astroblast, "Hey, 'Blast, we've got another passenger waiting over the
> hill, make sure to get him when you leave."
> 
> Astroblast's rear thrusters launch again, as he curves around to pick
> up the last target, Perceptor.
> 
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Menasor leaps forward, Prowl's missiles smashing into his virtually
> unmolested chest armour, causing him to hesitate a little.
> Incarcinator's charges land behind him, the explosions throwing up
> dirt and ashes around Menasor's feet. Menasor lunges at Prowl, trying
> to grab him in his large hands.
> 
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Rippersnapper ducks under the missiles. He stops right in front of
> Orion. He suddenly leaps forward, at Orion's chest, trying to claw
> him. (Alloran, is Orion as stupid as Rippersnapper? j/k Firing
> missiles that would damage both bots... something that Rippersnapper
> does. =)
> 
> -----------------------------------------------------------------
> 
> Lynxiz laughs at Grounded's words, "I hope that I don't get gunned
> down." She shivers and turns to Nightlight, "Nightlight, you were
> going to show me to my quarters for my stay?" 
> 
> 
>

> 
>
